sentences.en: At present, the opportunity and difficulty coexist in the development of hydropower.
sentences.cn: 当前发展水电的机遇与困难并存.

sentences.en: Brazil relies on hydropower for more than 80 % of its electricity.
sentences.cn: 巴西80%以上的电力都要依靠水电.

sentences.en: Developing hydropower more quickly would allow for increasing the renewable energy target above the envisaged government target without increasing the incremental cost of the program.
sentences.cn: 加快发展水电可以在不增加整个可再生能源开发方案总成本的同时，实现可再生能源发展的新目标。

sentences.en: Hydropower is electricity generated using the energy of moving water.
sentences.cn: 依靠水流动能发出的电叫水电.

sentences.en: If we do it ourselves, only cheap energy from hydropower will do.
sentences.cn: 如果靠自力更生，只有靠水电站带来的廉价能源了。

sentences.en: If we had listened to them, this hydropower station would never have been built.
sentences.cn: 当初要是依了他们的主张, 今天就不可能有这个水电站.

sentences.en: If we hadn't listened to them, this hydropower station would never have been built.
sentences.cn: 如果不是听取他们的建议, 今天就不可能有这个水电站.

sentences.en: It is new to use hydropower to generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 水能发电是新型的发电形式.

sentences.en: Oil and hydropower are the next biggest sources of energy.
sentences.cn: 石油及水电是今后最大的能源来源.

sentences.en: On the other hand, Longtan Hydropower Station is more price advantage.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 龙滩水电站更具价格优势.

sentences.en: Seepage analysis is an important item for hydropower engineering.
sentences.cn: 渗流分析是水电工程中一项重要的研究内容.

sentences.en: The hydropower resources are abundance in the southwest of China.
sentences.cn: 我国西南地区蕴藏着丰富的水资源.

sentences.en: There inside, such as farms and small hydropower stations.
sentences.cn: 境内还有饲养场及小水电站等.

sentences.en: They tried to pipe electricity in from a hydropower.
sentences.cn: 他们设法从水电站将电引进来.

sentences.en: We're going to pipe electricity in from a hydropower plant.
sentences.cn: 我们将从水电厂输电出来.

sentences.en: With hydropower, thermal power, wind power and other power structures.
sentences.cn: 公司拥有水电 、 火电 、 风电等多种电源结构.

sentences.en: Xihe hydropower station is the third cascade development on the Hanjiang River.
sentences.cn: 陕西汉江喜河水电站为汉江梯级电站开发的第三级.

phrases.tran_cn: 水利水电工程；水力工程学；水利工程
